title: Abilities
body: Hey anyone know the exact location of the preference that changes your abilities cooldowns from just seconds to minutes and seconds? Idk if I over looked it or if it is a thing but dyrus has it halp.

replies.body:
Got you covered!  It's under Options>Interface>Ability Cooldown Display.

Here's a handy [picture](http://i.imgur.com/VwZyx6G.jpg) for reference (with artistic stylings courtesy of moi)
I looked at the picture and laughed. Thank you haha
